project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Build a simple text-based game where the player can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and encounter challenges.

Implement feature to pick up items
Implement simple challenges for the player
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
